linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: 2.0ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel integrated graphics.
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: This will require to run the client in 30 FPS instead of 60 FPS.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: 2.4ghz or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB of VRAM Dedicated GPU.
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
